hero.description: Hello, I'm a mobile developer with 1 year of experience building high-performance iOS and Android apps. Experienced in Flutter, Swift, and SwiftUI technologies.

projects.description: Selected works from my mobile app development journey. Performance and scalable mobile solutions focusing on user experience.

safeRide.title: Safe Ride: Telemeter
safeRide.description: Wondering how much you leaned into that corner? Measure your lean angle, G-force, and speed instantly with SafeRide and analyze your ride.

pranks.title: Pranks: No Pop Up
pranks.description: A fun prank application with a smooth user experience and no intrusive pop-up ads.

memfast.title: Memfast
memfast.description: A memory game developed with Flutter containing an online leaderboard.

kacanKovalanir.title: Kaçan Kovalanır
kacanKovalanir.description: An engaging mobile game involving chase and escape mechanics.

qrGenerator.title: Qr Generator
qrGenerator.description: A simple and quick tool to generate QR codes for various purposes.

buShuffleE.title: BuShuffleE
buShuffleE.description: An application that offers random options for your indecisive moments.

rastgeleIsim.title: Rastgele İsim
rastgeleIsim.description: An application that offers random names.

profile.introPart1: Hello, I bring ideas to life in the mobile world. Using
profile.introPart3: , I design high-performance, user-friendly, and scalable mobile experiences. I create digital solutions with my projects published on App Store and Play Store.

contact.letsTurnYourConcept: Let's turn your concept into a polished, user-friendly mobile application.
